entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
